title: 2007 Oscar Nominations
body:
The 80th Annual Oscar nominations were announced this morning, and to no one's surprise, NO COUNTRY FOR OLD MEN and THERE WILL BE BLOOD lead the pack of nominees. Aside for those two, and a few other notable exceptions, 2007 was a fairly weak year for film -- epitomized by JUNO and ATONEMENT receiving nods for Best Picture (they weren't terrible films by any means, but they certainly weren't Best Picture caliber). I am happy, however, about all the sudden attention directed towards THE SAVAGES, which raked in two BIG nominations, as well as THE DIVING BELL AND THE BUTTERFLY, which received four nods. These and several other Moxie movies made the cut, which is something that always warms my heart.

As we do every year, I'll list all the nominees and highlight those that have played, or will be playing soon, at our humble little theater. Enjoy!
